doc.title: I Will Protect You
doc.plot: "I Will Protect You" is one American father's fight to survive the death of his daughter at the hands of Palestinian militants. Moved by grief, Stephen Flatow revitalizes Orthodox Jewish law governing organ donation, gets federal legislation passed, and reinvents international law for seeking restitution from terror. "I Will Protect You" explores the lengths a family will go to remember their loved one, and the struggle a father wages to never forget.
